verses.verse: אָשִׁ֤ירָה <WH7891> Now will I sing נָּא֙ <WH4994> now לִֽידִידִ֔י <WH3039> to my wellbeloved שִׁירַ֥ת <WH7892> a song דּוֹדִ֖י <WH1730> of my beloved לְכַרְמ֑וֹ <WH3754> touching his vineyard כֶּ֛רֶם <WH3754> hath a vineyard הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had לִֽידִידִ֖י <WH3039> My wellbeloved בְּקֶ֥רֶן <WH7161> hill בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> anointing

וַֽיְעַזְּקֵ֣הוּ <WH5823> And he fenced וַֽיְסַקְּלֵ֗הוּ <WH5619> it and gathered out the stones וַיִּטָּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5193> thereof and planted שֹׂרֵ֔ק <WH8321> it with the choicest vine וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> and built מִגְדָּל֙ <WH4026> a tower בְּתוֹכ֔וֹ <WH8432> in the midst וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also יֶ֖קֶב <WH3342> a winepress חָצֵ֣ב <WH2672> of it and also made בּ֑וֹ וַיְקַ֛ו <WH6960> therein and he looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <WH6025> grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and it brought forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <WH891> wild grapes

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> and now יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> And now O inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and men יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah שִׁפְטוּ־ <WH8199> judge נָ֕א <WH4994> I beseech thee בֵּינִ֖י <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between כַּרְמִֽי׃ <WH3754> I pray you betwixt me and my vineyard

מַה־ <WH4100> What לַּעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> What could have been done עוֹד֙ <WH5750> more לְכַרְמִ֔י <WH3754> more to my vineyard וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> that I have not done בּ֑וֹ מַדּ֧וּעַ <WH4069> in it? wherefore קִוֵּ֛יתִי <WH6960> when I looked לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> that it should bring forth עֲנָבִ֖ים <WH6025> grapes וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> brought it forth בְּאֻשִֽׁים׃ <WH891> worthless

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now אוֹדִֽיעָה־ <WH3045> And now go to I will tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> I beseech thee אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> you what I will do לְכַרְמִ֑י <WH3754> to my vineyard הָסֵ֤ר <WH5493> I will take away מְשׂוּכָּתוֹ֙ <WH4881> the hedge וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will become לְבָעֵ֔ר <WH1197> thereof and it shall be eaten up פָּרֹ֥ץ <WH6555> [and] break down גְּדֵר֖וֹ <WH1447> the wall וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will become לְמִרְמָֽס׃ <WH4823> thereof and it shall be trodden down

וַאֲשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <WH7896> And I will lay בָתָ֗ה <WH1326> it waste לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִזָּמֵר֙ <WH2168> it shall not be pruned וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יֵעָדֵ֔ר <WH5737> nor digged וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> but there shall come up שָׁמִ֖יר <WH8068> briers וָשָׁ֑יִת <WH7898> and thorns וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> and הֶעָבִים֙ <WH5645> the clouds אֲצַוֶּ֔ה <WH6680> I will also command מֵהַמְטִ֥יר <WH4305> that they rain עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and מָטָֽר׃ <WH4306> no rain

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֶ֜רֶם <WH3754> For the vineyard יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [is] the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah נְטַ֖ע <WH5194> plant שַׁעֲשׁוּעָ֑יו <WH8191> his pleasant וַיְקַ֤ו <WH6960> and he looked לְמִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> for judgment וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold מִשְׂפָּ֔ח <WH4939> but behold oppression לִצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> for righteousness וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold צְעָקָֽה׃ <WH6818> but behold a cry ס

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe מַגִּיעֵ֥י <WH5060> unto them that join בַ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> house בְּבַ֔יִת <WH1004> to house שָׂדֶ֥ה <WH7704> field בְשָׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> to field יַקְרִ֑יבוּ <WH7126> [that] lay עַ֚ד <WH5704> Until אֶ֣פֶס <WH657> till [there be] no מָק֔וֹם <WH4725> place וְהֽוּשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH3427> that they may be placed לְבַדְּכֶ֖ם <WH905> alone בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> alone in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

בְּאָזְנָ֖י <WH241> In mine ears יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [said] the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֞א <WH3808> Of a truth בָּתִּ֤ים <WH1004> houses רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> many לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> shall be desolate יִֽהְי֔וּ <WH1961> shall become גְּדֹלִ֥ים <WH1419> [even] great וְטוֹבִ֖ים <WH2896> and fair מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> without inhabitant

כִּ֗י <WH3588> Yea עֲשֶׂ֙רֶת֙ <WH6235> ten צִמְדֵּי־ <WH6776> acres כֶ֔רֶם <WH3754> of vineyard יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> shall yield בַּ֣ת <WH1324> bath אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> one וְזֶ֥רַע <WH2233> and the seed חֹ֖מֶר <WH2563> of an homer יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shall yield אֵיפָֽה׃ <WH374> an ephah פ

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Woe מַשְׁכִּימֵ֥י <WH7925> unto them that rise up early בַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> in the morning שֵׁכָ֣ר <WH7941> strong drink יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <WH7291> [that] they may follow מְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH309> that continue בַנֶּ֔שֶׁף <WH5399> until night יַ֖יִן <WH3196> [till] wine יַדְלִיקֵֽם׃ <WH1814> inflame

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> are by כִנּ֜וֹר <WH3658> And the harp וָנֶ֗בֶל <WH5035> and the viol תֹּ֧ף <WH8596> the tabret וְחָלִ֛יל <WH2485> and pipe וָיַ֖יִן <WH3196> and wine מִשְׁתֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4960> are in their feasts וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> פֹּ֤עַל <WH6467> not the work יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יַבִּ֔יטוּ <WH5027> but they regard וּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the operation יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> of his hands לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor רָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> neither consider

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore גָּלָ֥ה <WH1540> are gone into captivity עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Therefore my people מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> their lack דָ֑עַת <WH1847> because [they have] no knowledge וּכְבוֹדוֹ֙ <WH3519> and their honourable מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> men רָעָ֔ב <WH7458> [are] famished וַהֲמוֹנ֖וֹ <WH1995> and their multitude צִחֵ֥ה <WH6704> dried up צָמָֽא׃ <WH6772> with thirst

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore הִרְחִ֤יבָה <WH7337> hath enlarged שְּׁאוֹל֙ <WH7585> Therefore hell נַפְשָׁ֔הּ <WH5315> herself וּפָעֲרָ֥ה <WH6473> and opened פִ֖יהָ <WH6310> her mouth לִבְלִי־ <WH1097> without חֹ֑ק <WH2706> without measure וְיָרַ֨ד <WH3381> shall descend הֲדָרָ֧הּ <WH1926> and their glory וַהֲמוֹנָ֛הּ <WH1995> and their multitude וּשְׁאוֹנָ֖הּ <WH7588> and their pomp וְעָלֵ֥ז <WH5938> and he that rejoiceth בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּשַּׁ֥ח <WH7817> shall be brought down אָדָ֖ם <WH120> And the mean man וַיִּשְׁפַּל־ <WH8213> shall be humbled אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> and the mighty man וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> and the eyes גְבֹהִ֖ים <WH1364> of the lofty תִּשְׁפַּֽלְנָה׃ <WH8213> shall be humbled

וַיִּגְבַּ֛ה <WH1361> shall be exalted יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> But the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> in judgment וְהָאֵל֙ <WH410> and God הַקָּד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> that is holy נִקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH6942> shall be sanctified בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> in righteousness

וְרָע֥וּ <WH7462> feed כְבָשִׂ֖ים <WH3532> Then shall the lambs כְּדָבְרָ֑ם <WH1699> after their manner וְחָרְב֥וֹת <WH2723> and the waste places מֵחִ֖ים <WH4220> of the fat ones גָּרִ֥ים <WH1481> shall strangers יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> eat

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Woe מֹשְׁכֵ֥י <WH4900> unto them that draw הֶֽעָוֹ֖ן <WH5771> iniquity בְּחַבְלֵ֣י <WH2256> with cords הַשָּׁ֑וְא <WH7723> of vanity וְכַעֲב֥וֹת <WH5688> rope הָעֲגָלָ֖ה <WH5699> as it were with a cart חַטָּאָֽה׃ <WH2403> and sin

הָאֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> That say יְמַהֵ֧ר ׀ <WH4116> Let him make speed יָחִ֛ישָׁה <WH2363> [and] hasten מַעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <WH4639> his work לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of נִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> that we may see וְתִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> draw nigh וְתָב֗וֹאָה <WH935> and come עֲצַ֛ת <WH6098> [it] and let the counsel קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְנֵדָֽעָה׃ <WH3045> that we may know ס

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <WH559> unto them that call לָרַ֛ע <WH7451> evil ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good וְלַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> and good רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil שָׂמִ֨ים <WH7760> that put חֹ֤שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness לְאוֹר֙ <WH216> for light וְא֣וֹר <WH216> and light לְחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> for darkness שָׂמִ֥ים <WH7760> that put מַ֛ר <WH4751> bitter לְמָת֖וֹק <WH4966> for sweet וּמָת֥וֹק <WH4966> and sweet לְמָֽר׃ <WH4751> for bitter ס

ה֖וֹי <WH1945> Woe חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> unto [them that are] wise בְּעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> in their own eyes וְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> their own פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> in their own sight נְבֹנִֽים׃ <WH995> and prudent

ה֕וֹי <WH1945> Woe גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <WH1368> unto [them that are] mighty לִשְׁתּ֣וֹת <WH8354> to drink יָ֑יִן <WH3196> wine וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> and men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of strength לִמְסֹ֥ךְ <WH4537> to mingle שֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> strong drink

מַצְדִּיקֵ֥י <WH6663> Which justify רָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> the wicked עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> for שֹׁ֑חַד <WH7810> reward וְצִדְקַ֥ת <WH6666> the righteousness צַדִּיקִ֖ים <WH6662> of the righteous יָסִ֥ירוּ <WH5493> and take away מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at ס

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore כֶּאֱכֹ֨ל <WH398> devoureth קַ֜שׁ <WH7179> the stubble לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> A tongue אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> Therefore as the fire וַחֲשַׁ֤שׁ <WH2842> the chaff לֶֽהָבָה֙ <WH3852> the flame יִרְפֶּ֔ה <WH7503> consumeth שָׁרְשָׁם֙ <WH8328> [so] their root כַּמָּ֣ק <WH4716> shall be as rottenness יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become וּפִרְחָ֖ם <WH6525> and their blossom כָּאָבָ֣ק <WH80> as dust יַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> shall go up כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מָאֲס֗וּ <WH3988> because they have cast away אֵ֚ת <WH853> תּוֹרַת֙ <WH8451> the law יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> אִמְרַ֥ת <WH565> the word קְדֽוֹשׁ־ <WH6918> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נִאֵֽצוּ׃ <WH5006> and despised

עַל־ <WH5921> against כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> this חָרָה֩ <WH2734> kindled אַף־ <WH639> Therefore is the anger יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעַמּ֜וֹ <WH5971> against his people וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> and he hath stretched forth יָד֧וֹ <WH3027> his hand עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> against וַיַּכֵּ֗הוּ <WH5221> against them and hath smitten וַֽיִּרְגְּזוּ֙ <WH7264> did tremble הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> them and the hills וַתְּהִ֧י <WH1961> lay נִבְלָתָ֛ם <WH5038> and their carcases כַּסּוּחָ֖ה <WH5478> [were] torn בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> in the midst חוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> of the streets בְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> is not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <WH5750> is still יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> [is] stretched out

וְנָֽשָׂא־ <WH5375> And he will lift up נֵ֤ס <WH5251> an ensign לַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> to the nations מֵרָח֔וֹק <WH7350> from far וְשָׁ֥רַק <WH8319> and will hiss ל֖וֹ מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> unto them from the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold מְהֵרָ֖ה <WH4120> with speed קַ֥ל <WH7031> swiftly יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> and behold they shall come

אֵין־ <WH369> No עָיֵ֤ף <WH5889> None shall be weary וְאֵין־ <WH369> one כּוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH3782> nor stumble בּ֔וֹ לֹ֥א <WH3808> None יָנ֖וּם <WH5123> among them none shall slumber וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִישָׁ֑ן <WH3462> nor sleep וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor נִפְתַּח֙ <WH6605> be loosed אֵז֣וֹר <WH232> neither shall the girdle חֲלָצָ֔יו <WH2504> of their loins וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor נִתַּ֖ק <WH5423> be broken שְׂר֥וֹךְ <WH8288> nor the latchet נְעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5275> of their shoes

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> its חִצָּיו֙ <WH2671> Whose arrows שְׁנוּנִ֔ים <WH8150> [are] sharp וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קַשְּׁתֹתָ֖יו <WH7198> and all their bows דְּרֻכ֑וֹת <WH1869> bent פַּרְס֤וֹת <WH6541> hoofs סוּסָיו֙ <WH5483> their horses' כַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> like flint נֶחְשָׁ֔בוּ <WH2803> shall be counted וְגַלְגִּלָּ֖יו <WH1534> and their wheels כַּסּוּפָֽה׃ <WH5492> like a whirlwind

שְׁאָגָ֥ה <WH7581> Their roaring ל֖וֹ כַּלָּבִ֑יא <WH3833> [shall be] like a lion [וְשָׁאַג כ] (יִשְׁאַ֨ג <WH7580> mightily ק) כַּכְּפִירִ֤ים <WH3715> like young lions וְיִנְהֹם֙ <WH5098> yea they shall roar וְיֹאחֵ֣ז <WH270> and lay hold טֶ֔רֶף <WH2964> of the prey וְיַפְלִ֖יט <WH6403> and shall carry [it] away safe וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and none shall deliver

וְיִנְהֹ֥ם <WH5098> they shall roar עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> over בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he כְּנַהֲמַת־ <WH5100> against them like the roaring יָ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea וְנִבַּ֤ט <WH5027> and if [one] look לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> unto the land וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> behold darkness צַ֣ר <WH6862> [and] sorrow וָא֔וֹר <WH216> and the light חָשַׁ֖ךְ <WH2821> is darkened בַּעֲרִיפֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6183> in the heavens פ
